page.title: 19HOLIDAY HABITS OF B. HILL
page.content: We questioned five people outside Chigwell Tube Station on their holiday habits.The answers are in blue. 1. Where do you go on holiday? {England / Abroad / France / Germany / {Italy 2. Do you have a second home? {No / Yes / No / Yes / No 3. How many times do you go on holiday each year?{1 / 3 / 3 / 2 / 4 4. How do you travel when you go on holiday? {car / plane / plane / boat / plane 5. Where is your favourite place to spend a holiday? {Switerland / France / Scotland / Spain { England 6. Where do you stay? {caravan / villa / hotel / hotel / {hotel 7. How long do you stay away? {1 wk./2 wks/2wks/3wks/4wks
